reviews.title: Best camera phone I've owned
reviews.review_text: The camera quality is absolutely phenomenal. Low-light performance is leagues ahead of my previous phone. Battery life easily gets me through a full day of heavy use. The 120Hz display is incredibly smooth.

reviews.title: Solid flagship experience
reviews.review_text: Really impressed with the performance. Gaming is butter smooth and the phone doesn't get too hot. Only complaint is the price, but you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.review_text: Upgraded from a 3-year-old phone and the difference is night and day. The screen is gorgeous, photos look professional, and the speed is incredible.
